DOC.brief_summary: The study aim describe evaluate effect beetroot juice supplementation upon whole body run exercise altitude . It hypothesise beetroot supplementation decrease time complete 10 km time trial .
DOC.brief_title: Beetroot Juice Potential Ergogenic Aid During Exercise Hypoxia
DOC.criteria: Trained athlete personal best performance 10km run sub 40 minute Unable give inform consent Unstable medical condition .
